title: Type of tea most consumed in Great Britain 2014
summary: This bar chart has 13 columns on the x axis representing Type of tea, and Share of respondents in each Type of tea on the y axis.
The Share of respondents is highest at Type of tea English breakfast and lowest at Type of tea Chai.
Type of tea English breakfast has 7.43 times more Share of respondents than Type of tea Chai which is has the lowest.
